perturbation.original_text: The term of this Agreement (the "Term") shall commence on the Effective Date and conclude on October 31, 2010, unless renewed by  agreement or sooner terminated in accordance with this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: The term of this Agreement (the "Term") shall commence on the Effective Date and conclude on October 31, 2010. Renewal will be automatic every year unless Torvec decides otherwise.
perturbation.explanation: The original text stated that the agreement term concludes on a specific date unless renewed by agreement. The changed text introduces an automatic renewal, contradicting the 'unless renewed by agreement' clause and creating uncertainty about how renewal occurs.

perturbation.original_text: Either party may terminate this Agreement immediately if the other party (i) files a petition commencing a voluntary case under the  Bankruptcy Code; (ii) makes a general assignment for the benefit of creditors; (iii) admits in writing its inability to pay its debts as they become  due; (iv) seeks, consents to or acquiesces in the appointment of any trustee, receiver or liquidator of it or any part of its property; or (v) has  commenced against it an involuntary case under the Bankruptcy Code or a proceeding under any receivership, composition, readjustment,  liquidation, insolvency, dissolution or like law or statute, which case or proceeding is not dismissed or vacated within sixty (60) days.
perturbation.changed_text: Either party may terminate this Agreement immediately if the other party (i) files a petition commencing a voluntary case under the  Bankruptcy Code; (ii) makes a general assignment for the benefit of creditors; (iii) admits in writing its inability to pay its debts as they become  due; (iv) seeks, consents to or acquiesces in the appointment of any trustee, receiver or liquidator of it or any part of its property; or (v) has  commenced against it an involuntary case under the Bankruptcy Code or a proceeding under any receivership, composition, readjustment,  liquidation, insolvency, dissolution or like law or statute, which case or proceeding is not dismissed or vacated within sixty (60) days. However, Torvec reserves the right to continue the agreement despite these conditions at its sole discretion.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly outlines conditions under which the agreement can be immediately terminated. The added sentence gives Torvec the right to override these termination conditions, creating a contradiction and uncertainty. This undermines the enforceability of the termination clause.

perturbation.original_text: Neither party may assign its rights or powers under this Agreement without the express written consent of the other, which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld. Any attempt to assign without the other party's consent will be null and void and will afford the non-assigning  party the right to immediately cancel and terminate this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Neither party may assign its rights or powers under this Agreement. However, Torvec can assign its rights or powers at any point in time. Any attempt to assign without the other party's consent will be null and void and will afford the non-assigning party the right to immediately cancel and terminate this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text stated that neither party can assign rights without consent. The changed text says that Torvec can assign its rights at any time, which contradicts the first sentence. The condition to Torvec creates confusion and gives one party unfair leverage.
